message: I propose a fair split, considering your share will be worth more in future rounds due to lower inflation.
I'll take a bigger share now, but I'll give you a chance to negotiate in future rounds.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split the money more evenly this time.  We both have to be mindful of the inflation, so we can't keep pushing for extreme splits.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I still think I deserve a slightly larger share due to the initial proposal being unfair.
